articles.title: Extreme dynamics in a biomolecular condensate - Nature.com
articles.description: Two highly charged disordered human proteins phase-separate into viscous complex coacervates while retaining their rapid conformational dynamics through pico- to nanosecond exchange of short-lived side-chain interactions.
